column.name: SM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '

                  声  明  书

' +'

立项小组成员与本次参与表决的项目是否存在以下需要回避表决的情形：(请选择“是”或“否”)

' +'

1、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目的项目组成员（包括该项目其他中介机构项目组成员）；

' +'

2、本人或直系亲属直接或间接持有待表决项目相关公司的股份等权益；

' +'

3、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目相关公司的董事、监事、高级管理人员，或为待表决项目相关公司的实际控制人；

' +'

4、本人与待表决项目的项目组，归属于公司同一投行业务部门（团队），或待表决项目的项目组属于本人分管的承做部门（团队）；

' +'

5、待表决项目由委员本人或其直系亲属，或其直系亲属担任董事、监事、高级管理人员的单位承揽或协助承揽。

' +'

 

'

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: LXBJYJ
column.option: 1|同意;3|有条件同意;4|暂缓;2|不同意
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFHB!=1

column.name: BJYJSM
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFHB!=1

column.name: TX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程<font>'

column.name: BZHSCCK
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> // var url='/bss/ibb/page/index.sdo#/map/knowledge/map/mapDocs/flid=54&bt=立项资料'; var url='/bss/ibb/page/index.sdo#/map/knowledge/map/mapDocs/flid%3D78%26bt%3D%25E7%25AB%258B%25E9%25A1%25B9%25E9%2598%25B6%25E6%25AE%25B5%25E7%259B%25B8%25E5%2585%25B3%25E5%2588%25B6%25E5%25BA%25A6%25E5%258F%258A%25E6%25A8%25A1%25E6%259D%25BF'; '' //'下载'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_LXSP_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_LXSP_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=100000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_LXSP'; '' //'下载'

column.name: ZYLDYJ
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcib_lxsp";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> 6==6

constraint.SQL:
["FUNC_IB_LCFQCSJY('lcIB_LXSP',tIB_XMXX.ID,tIB_XMXX.XMLX,{1}) = 1 and
NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXSP T,JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY WF
 WHERE XMMC = tIB_XMXX.ID 
								 AND WF.ID = T.INSTID
									AND WF.STATE IN (1)
									AND (HYJG = 0 OR HYJG IS NULL))
and tIB_XMXX.XMFL=1
OR ID = {0}",[{"expression":"XMMC","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1},{"expression":"ID","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1}]]

column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

constraint.SQL: ["tuser.orgid in (select id from jgcrm.LBORGANIZATION start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]
["tuser.orgid in (select id from jgcrm.LBORGANIZATION start with id = 13831 connect by prior id = fid)",[]]

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_LXSP_ZKBSHYJHZ where lcIB_LXSP_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)
